channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Spectrum Protect Plus
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Spectrum Protect Plus

item.title: CVE-2018-1768|2024-08-05T04:07:44.351Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20protect%20plus
item.description: IBM Spectrum Protect Plus 10.1.0 and 10.1.1 could disclose sensitive information when an authorized user executes a test operation, the user id an password may be displayed in plain text within an instrumentation log file. IBM X-Force ID: 148622.
